title: What smartphones have eSIM technology in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: What smartphones have eSIM technology in 2020? According to GSMArena’s phone finder, these 12 devices are the ones released so far in 2020 with eSIM support, that is from a total of 174 devices released. The total number of devices with eSIM is 45 In 2016, the Samsung Gear S2 smartwatch was the first device to implement an eSIM.
iPhone XS and XR (2018) are the first Apple devices to include eSIM.
